entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight then changing to rain at times heavy before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
